entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Varennes
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 6:27 PM EST Tuesday 07 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Periods of rain or drizzle. Temperature rising to plus 4 by morning.
entry.summary: Periods of rain or drizzle ending overnight then cloudy. Wind southwest 30 km/h. Temperature rising to plus 4 by morning. Forecast issued 9:03 PM EST Tuesday 07 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Mainly cloudy. Temperature steady near plus 3.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Wind west 30 km/h gusting to 50. Temperature steady near plus 3. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 9:03 PM EST Tuesday 07 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Clearing. Low minus 6.
entry.summary: Clearing in the evening. Wind west 20 km/h becoming light in the evening. Low minus 6. Wind chill minus 8 overnight. Forecast issued 9:03 PM EST Tuesday 07 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Periods of snow. High plus 1.
entry.summary: Periods of snow. High plus 1. Forecast issued 9:03 PM EST Tuesday 07 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Snow or rain. Low plus 2.
entry.summary: Snow or rain. Low plus 2. Forecast issued 9:03 PM EST Tuesday 07 February 2023

entry.title: Friday: Periods of rain. High plus 3.
entry.summary: Periods of rain. Windy. High plus 3. Forecast issued 9:03 PM EST Tuesday 07 February 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Cloudy. Low minus 7.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Low minus 7. Forecast issued 9:03 PM EST Tuesday 07 February 2023
